Package com.atakmap.android.routes

Interface RouteNavigationManager.RouteNavigationManagerEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NavigationFeedbackService, NavigationZoomService, ObjectivePairingService, RouteNavigationViewModel
    Enclosing class:
    RouteNavigationManager
    public static interface RouteNavigationManager.RouteNavigationManagerEventListener

    • Method Detail

      • onGpsStatusChanged

        void onGpsStatusChanged​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager,
                        boolean found)
        Indicates the location has changed.
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager - The RouteNavigationManager.
        found - if the gps is found or false if it has been lost.

      • onLocationChanged

        void onLocationChanged​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager,
                       GeoPoint oldLocation,
                       GeoPoint newLocation)
        Indicates the location has changed.
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager - The RouteNavigationManager.
        oldLocation - The previous location.
        newLocation - The new location.

      • onNavigationObjectiveChanged

        void onNavigationObjectiveChanged​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager,
                                  PointMapItem newObjective,
                                  boolean isFromRouteProgression)
        Indicates that the navigation objective has changed.
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager - The RouteNavigationManager.
        newObjective - The new navigation objective.
        isFromRouteProgression - Indicates whether the event was raised due to natural route progression (e.g. the previous checkpoint was hit), or from manual intervention (e.g. the user skipped to this checkpoint).

      • onOffRoute

        void onOffRoute​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager)
        Indicates that the user has gone off route (Note: Only fired the first time the user has gone off route, not continuously).
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager -

      • onReturnedToRoute

        void onReturnedToRoute​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager)
        Indicates that the user has returned to the route.
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager -

      • onTriggerEntered

        void onTriggerEntered​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager,
                      PointMapItem item,
                      int triggerIndex)
        Indicates that a navigation trigger has been entered.
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager - The RouteNavigationManager.
        item - The PointMapItem that's trigger has been entered.
        triggerIndex - The index of the PointMapItem.

      • onArrivedAtPoint

        void onArrivedAtPoint​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager,
                      PointMapItem item)
        Indicates that the user has arrived at a point (i.e. they have entered the bubble radius of a particular point).
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager - The RouteNavigationManager.
        item - The item at which the user has arrived at.

      • onDepartedPoint

        void onDepartedPoint​(RouteNavigationManager routeNavigationManager,
                     PointMapItem item)
        Indicates that the user has departed a point (i.e. they have passed the point). Note: this will usually follow the `onArrivedAtPoint` event.
        Parameters:
        routeNavigationManager - The RouteNavigationManager.
        item - The item from which the user has just departed.
